page.title: 10NURSING HOME FOR THE ELDERLY
page.content: Our teacher Miss Walker arranged for Samantha and me(Beverley) to visit {The Edwinstowe Nursing Home for the {Elderly}at 2.00pm on Wednesday the 3rd July.We found the guests sitting outside in very hot weather after finishing their dinner.Mrs.Cannon who was in charge introduced us to guests and nurses.The oldest guest was{93}and the youngest{62.} Although it looked large on the outside it was quite small on the inside and only caters for{25 guests at any one time. In the past it was called{Field {House}and belonged to the{National {Coal Board.}Built originally by a private coal company it was used as a manager's house. Having been nationalised it is now privatised and not part of the National Health Service but still helps the elderly.
